label: A10 Right of natural persons to opt out from primary use
definition: Right of natural persons to opt out from the access to their personal electronic health data registered in an EHR system through the electronic health data access services

label: A100 Right to receive compensation
definition: Right of natural and legal persons to receive compensation in accordance with EU and national law in case that they have suffered material or non-material damage as a result of an infringement of the EHDS Regulation

label: A16-1 Right of identification management
definition: Right of natural persons to identify themselves electronically using any electronic identification means which are recognised pursuant to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) No 910/2014

label: A21 Right to lodge a complaint with a digital health authority
definition: Right of natural and legal persons to lodge a complaint with the competent digital health authority

label: A3 Right of natural persons to access their personal electronic health data
definition: Right of natural persons to access personal electronic health data relating to them that belong to the priority categories referred to in Article 14 and are processed for the provision of healthcare through the electronic health data access services referred to in Article 4

label: A5 Right of natural persons to insert information in their own EHR
definition: Right of natural persons to insert information in their EHR through electronic health data access services or applications linked to those services

label: A6 Right of natural persons to rectification
definition: Right of natural persons to request online the rectification of their personal electronic health data

label: A68-11 Right to process in a secure processing environment
definition: Right of health data users to access and process the electronic health data in a secure processing environment in accordance with the data permit issued to them

label: A7 Right to data portability for natural persons
definition: Right of natural persons to give access to, or to request a healthcare provider to transmit, all or part of their personal electronic health data to another healthcare provider of their choice

label: A71 Right of natural persons to opt out from secondary use
definition: Right of natural persons to opt out at any time, and without providing any reason, from the processing of personal electronic health data relating to them for secondary use

label: A8 Right to restrict access
definition: Right of natural persons to restrict the access of health professionals and healthcare providers to all or parts of their personal electronic health data

label: A9 Right to obtain information on accessing data
definition: Right of natural persons to obtain information, including through automatic notifications, on any access to their personal electronic health data through the health professional access service obtained in the context of healthcare

label: Administrative Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of administrative services related to healthcare

label: Authorised Representative
definition: Legal representative established in the EU of a manufacturer of an EHR system established outside of the EU

label: Behavioural Health Determinant
definition: Information about behavioural data impacting on health

label: Biobank Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from biobanks and associated databases

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Claims
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on claims

label: Clinical Investigations Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical investigations

label: Clinical Studies Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical studies

label: Clinical Trials Data
definition: Information about health data from clinical trials

label: Data Permit
definition: Permit issued by health data access bodies to health data applicants regarding health data access applications

label: Develop Public Health Products and Services
definition: Purposes associated with developing products and services that contribute to public health

label: Digital Health Authority Activity Report
definition: Document containing an overview of activities reported by a digital health authority

label: Discharge Report
definition: Information about discharge reports

label: Disease Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical registries for specific diseases

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Dispensations
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on dispensations

label: European Health Data Space Board
definition: An authority tasked with facilitating the cooperation and the exchange of information among Member States and the Commission for primary and secondary use

label: Electronic Health Record (EHR)
definition: Electronic health record (EHR) means a collection of electronic health data related to a natural person and collected in the health system, processed for the purpose of the provision of healthcare
scopenote: This concept represents the EHR itself with EHRData referring to data within it

label: Electronic Health Record (EHR) Data
definition: Information about data from electronic health records
scopenote: This concept represents the data within EHR and not the EHR itself

label: Electronic Health Record System
definition: A system whereby the software and/or hardware allows personal electronic health data to be collected and processed, to be used by healthcare providers when providing patient care or by patients when accessing their electronic health data

label: EHR System Information Sheet
definition: Technical documentation with information related to the EHR system, including its manufacturer, intended purpose and supported standards

label: EHR System Technical Documentation
definition: Technical documentation that demonstrates that the EHR system manufacturers comply with the requirements laid down in Annex II

label: EU Database for Registration of EHR Systems
definition: Publicly available database established by the European Commission to maintain data on EHR systems for which an EU declaration of conformity has been issued according to EHDS Article 39

label: EU Database for Registration of Wellness Applications
definition: Publicly available database established by the European Commission to maintain data on wellness applications for which a label has been issued pursuant to EHDS Article 47

label: EU Declaration of Conformity
definition: Declaration of conformity by the EU stating that the manufacturer of an EHR system has demonstrated that the essential requirements laid down in EHDS Annex II have been fulfilled

label: Electronic Dispensation
definition: Information about electronic dispensations

label: Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about electronic health data, including personal and non-personal data

label: Electronic Health Data Access Service
definition: Technical service, such as an online portal or application, that allows data subjects to access their electronic health data or the electronic health data of those natural persons whose electronic health data they are legally authorised to access

label: Electronic Prescription
definition: Information about electronic prescriptions

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Healthcare
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of healthcare, including patients safety

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Medical Devices
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of medical devices

label: Ensure Quality and Safety of Medicinal Products
definition: Purposes associated with ensuring high levels of quality and safety of medicinal products

label: Environmental Health Determinant
definition: Information about environmental data impacting on health

label: Epigenomic Data
definition: Information about epigenomic data

label: European Digital Testing Environment
definition: Data processing environment for the assessment of harmonised software components of EHR systems

label: Genomic Data
definition: Information about genomic data

label: Health-related Administrative Data
definition: Information about health-related administrative data

label: Health Data Access Application
definition: Application sent by a natural or legal person to health data access bodies, seeking access to electronic health data for secondary use

label: Health Data Access Body
definition: An entity governed by public law responsible for granting access to electronic health data for secondary use

label: Health Data Holder
definition: An entity in the healthcare sector who has the right to process personal electronic health data or make available non-personal electronic health data

label: Health Data Request
definition: Request sent by health data applicants to health data access bodies, seeking access to statistically anonymised electronic health data for secondary use

label: Health Data User
definition: An entity in the healthcare sector who was granted access to electronic health data for secondary use

label: Health Professional Access Service
definition: Technical service, supported by an EHR system, that enables health professionals to access data of natural persons under their care

label: Health Professional Data
definition: Information about the status of the health professionals involved in the treatment of the person, including information on their specialisation and institution

label: Health Questionnaire
definition: Information about health data from questionnaires

label: Health Survey
definition: Information about health data from surveys

label: Healthcare Financing Aggregated Data
definition: Information about aggregated data on healthcare expenditure and financing

label: Healthcare Needs Aggregated Data
definition: Information about aggregated data on healthcare needs

label: Healthcare Provision Aggregated Data
definition: Information about aggregated data on the provision of and access to healthcare

label: Healthcare Resources Aggregated Data
definition: Information about aggregated data on resources allocated to healthcare

label: Healthcare Scientific Research
definition: Purposes associated with healthcare scientific research

label: Improve Healthcare
definition: Purposes associated with improving healthcare systems, including the delivery of care and the provision and optimisation of treatment

label: Improve Healthcare Education
definition: Purposes associated with improving the provision of healthcare education

label: Inferred Health Data
definition: Information about inferred health data, including improvements such as correction, annotation, or enrichment based on authorised processing operations

label: Interoperability Software for EHR System
definition: Software component of the EHR system which provides and receives personal electronic health data under a priority category for primary use established under the EHDS Regulation in the European electronic health record exchange format

label: Lipidomic Data
definition: Information about lipidomic data

label: Logging Software for EHR System
definition: Software component of the EHR system which provides logging information related to access by health professionals or other individuals to priority categories of personal electronic health data

label: Medical Devices Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical devices

label: Medical Devices Dispensation
definition: Purposes associated with the dispensation of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Prescription
definition: Purposes associated with prescription of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of medical devices

label: Medical Devices Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from registries for medical devices

label: Medical Imaging
definition: Information about medical imaging studies and related imaging reports

label: Medical Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from medical registries

label: Medical Test Result
definition: Information about medical test results

label: Medicinal Products Dispensation
definition: Purposes associated with the dispensation of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Prescription
definition: Purposes associated with prescription of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of medicinal products

label: Medicinal Products Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from registries for medicinal products

label: Metabolomic Data
definition: Information about metabolomic data

label: Mortality Registry Data
definition: Information about electronic health data from mortality registries

label: Non-Personal Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about electronic health data that is not personal data, including anonymised data

label: Pathogen Data
definition: Information about relevant pathogen data, impacting on human health

label: Patient Summary
definition: Information about patient summaries

label: Performance Studies Data
definition: Information about health data from performance studies

label: Person Generated Medical Devices Data
definition: Information about person generated medical devices data

label: Person Generated Wellness Application Data
definition: Information about person generated wellness applications data

label: Personal Electronic Health Data
definition: Information about personal health data, including genetic data, processed in an electronic form

label: Protect against Cross-border Threats to Health
definition: Purposes associated with the protection against serious cross-border threats to health

label: Proteomic Data
definition: Information about proteomic data

label: Provide Healthcare Official Statistics
definition: Purposes associated with facilitating the development, production and dissemination of reliable official statistics related to health or care sectors

label: Public Health Registry Data
definition: Information about registries of public health data

label: Public Health Surveillance
definition: Purposes associated with public health surveillance

label: Public Interest related to Health
definition: Purposes associated with pursuing activities for reasons of public interest in the area of public and occupational health

label: Public Policy Making
definition: Purposes associated with public policy making policymaking in the healthcare sector

label: Health-related Administrative Data on Reimbursements
definition: Information about health-related administrative data on reimbursements

label: Reimbursement Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of reimbursement services related to healthcare

label: Research Cohort Data
definition: Information about health data from research cohorts

label: Social Services Provision
definition: Purposes associated with the provision of social services related to healthcare

label: Socioeconomic Health Determinant
definition: Information about socioeconomic data impacting on health

label: Support Authorities in Regulatory Activities
definition: Purposes associated with supporting authorities to carry out their regulatory tasks

label: Train, Test and Evaluate AI Systems Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in AI systems

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Health-related Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating health-related algorithms

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Health Apps Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in digital health applications

label: Train, Test and Evaluate Medical Devices Algorithms
definition: Purposes associated with training, testing and evaluating algorithms in medical devices

label: Transcriptomic Data
definition: Information about transcriptomic data

label: Trusted Health Data Holder
definition: A health data holder that meets the conditions for the simplified procedure to access electronic health data

label: Wellness Application
definition: Software component for the processing of electronic health data, specifically for providing information on the health of natural persons, or the delivery of care for purposes other than the provision of healthcare

label: Wellness Application Label
definition: Label issued by the manufacturer of the wellness application that indicating its compliance with the common specifications referred to in EHDS Article 36 and the requirements laid down in EHDS Annex II
